item.title: Goodbye
item.description: Well, see ya! When $a \ne 0$, there are two solutions to $ax^2 + bx + c = 0$ and they are $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.$$

item.title: Hello
item.description: What a wonderful blog This is text. Wow! Code? A list? Yes. A list!
